body:
### Describe the bug

Hello up there. I've hit an ICE while porting my pygolang code to Cython 3. Please find a minimal reproduction below. Thanks beforehand, Kirill.


### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

---- 8< ---- (bug.pyx)
```pyx
# cython: language_level=3
# distutils: language = c++
 
from libcpp.string cimport string
from libcpp.typeinfo cimport type_info
from cython.operator cimport typeid
 
cdef extern from "*":
    int* zzz()
    string error()
 
def hhh():
    cdef const type_info* typ = &typeid(zzz()[0])
    return hash(typ.name()) ^ hash(error())
```


```console
((1.venv) ) kirr@deca:~/tmp/trashme/pyexc$ cythonize bug.pyx 
Compiling /home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/bug.pyx because it changed.
[1/1] Cythonizing /home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/bug.pyx
Traceback (most recent call last):

...
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 615, in compile_single
    return run_pipeline(source, options, full_module_name)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 539, in run_pipeline
    err, enddata = Pipeline.run_pipeline(pipeline, source)
                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 398, in run_pipeline
    data = run(phase, data)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 375, in run
    return phase(data)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 52, in generate_pyx_code_stage
    module_node.process_implementation(options, result)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 222, in process_implementation
    self.generate_c_code(env, options, result)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 516, in generate_c_code
    self.body.generate_function_definitions(env, code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 404, in generate_function_definitions
    stat.generate_function_definitions(env, code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 3526, in generate_function_definitions
    FuncDefNode.generate_function_definitions(self, env, code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 2210, in generate_function_definitions
    self.generate_function_body(env, code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 1969, in generate_function_body
    self.body.generate_execution_code(code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 410, in generate_execution_code
    stat.generate_execution_code(code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 6072, in generate_execution_code
    self.generate_rhs_evaluation_code(code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 6371, in generate_rhs_evaluation_code
    self.rhs.generate_evaluation_code(code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 836, in generate_evaluation_code
    self.generate_subexpr_evaluation_code(code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 851, in generate_subexpr_evaluation_code
    node.generate_evaluation_code(code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 842, in generate_evaluation_code
    self.generate_result_code(code)
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 11528, in generate_result_code
    arg_code = self.arg_type.result()
               ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 534, in result
    return self.calculate_result_code()
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 4498, in calculate_result_code
    return index_code % (self.base.result(), self.index.result())
                                             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 534, in result
    return self.calculate_result_code()
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/home/kirr/tmp/trashme/pyexc/1.venv/lib/python3.12/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 1523, in calculate_result_code
    return self.result_code
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
AttributeError: 'IntNode' object has no attribute 'result_code'. Did you mean: 'result_ctype'?
```



### Expected behaviour

the code compiles ok.

### OS

Linux

### Python version

3.12.11

### Cython version

3.0.12

### Additional context

_No response_

comment_data.body: This looks to bisect to d53646f193bf8be44495c3294d8c76c986b7921e

title: [BUG] AttributeError: 'IntNode' object has no attribute 'result_code'
